importantDates.descriptionOfWhyDateIsRelevant: The incident occurred on Saturday, October 19, 2025, in Bladensburg, Maryland, and the report was updated to reflect the developments on that day, including the suspect's surrender and official statements.

importantTimeframes.descriptionOfWhyTimeFrameIsRelevant: The article was updated and published at 3:23 PM EDT on October 19, 2025, indicating the latest verified information on the incident.

keyTakeAways: A car plowed into a birthday party tent in Bladensburg, Maryland, on Saturday, killing one person and injuring 13.
The victim who died was Ashley Hernandez Gutierrez, 31, of Washington, D.C.
The suspect, a 66-year-old man from Washington, D.C., fled the scene initially but later turned himself in.
The incident occurred in a residential neighborhood where neighbors reported hearing loud booms and seeing a car driving erratically.

Jocelyn Route, a former Prince George’s County school board member and Bladensburg council member, witnessed the crash and described the scene, including children being pinned and emergency vehicles arriving.
A video posted on X (formerly Twitter) shows police and firefighters responding to the scene, with the tent partially collapsed and visibly damaged.
The victims include six adults and eight children aged 1 to 17; one child remains in the hospital in stable condition.
Three adult victims remain hospitalized in stable condition, one is awaiting treatment, and one has been released.

summaryOfNewsArticle: A car plowed into a birthday party tent in Bladensburg, Maryland, killing 31-year-old Ashley Hernandez Gutierrez and injuring 13 others, including six adults and eight children ranging in age from 1 to 17. The suspect, a 66-year-old man from Washington, D.C., fled the scene initially but later turned himself in. Neighbors, including former Bladensburg council member Jocelyn Route, reported hearing explosions and witnessing the crash, with children appearing injured. Emergency responders found the tent torn open and partially collapsed. A video posted on X shows the aftermath. Most victims are in stable condition, with one child and three adults still hospitalized.
title: Driver plows into child’s birthday party in Maryland, killing 1 and injuring 13, turns himself in
